column1: Hisua is a Assembly constituency of the Legislative Assembly of Bihar covering the city of Hisua in the Nawada district of Bihar
Hisua is one of six assembly constituencies in the Nawada (Lok Sabha constituency). Since 2008
column2: this assembly constituency is numbered 236 amongst 243 constituencies.

column1: Currently this seat belongs to Bharatiya Janta Party candidate Anil Singh
column2: who won in last Assembly election of 2015 Bihar Legislative Assembly election by defeating Janata Dal (United) candidate Kaushal Yadav by a margin of 12
